detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#166-172):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#170)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#197-218):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#201)

ERC20.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#284-294) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 6666000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__73.sol#290)
